---
title: "Code of Conduct"
---

This training program runs under the [Open Scholarship Initiative Code of Conduct](https://github.com/open-scholarship-sfu/phase1-base/blob/1998ec09acc4ee9fb4da35442e255ebc2f5a558a/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.pdf). Please read it carefully before agreeing to join us.

In summary, we expect you to be excellent to each other. If you witness or experience any violation of this Code of Conduct, please reach out to one of the [instructors](/index.qmd#instructors) immediately.
